hymn.title: The love of God constrains me

lyrics.stanza: The love of God constrains me From the depths within my spirit And He fills me up to the brim.
The love of God compels me From the depths within my spirit And He fills me up to the brim.
Now I am satisfied! And it's God who lives in me, Expressing His divinity.
For when I shout: Amen! Praise the Lord! Hallelujah! The love of God enters me.
